subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In their first game without their injured captain, Ryan Callahan, who is out 10 to 14 days, the Rangers could not come up with a goal against the Penguins, who managed three.
snippet: In their first game without their injured captain, Ryan Callahan, who is out 10 to 14 days, the Rangers could not come up with a goal against the Penguins, who managed three.
